alert.note: Alert for Bee; Coastal Aransas; Coastal Calhoun; Coastal Refugio; Goliad; Inland Calhoun; Inland Refugio; Inland San Patricio; Victoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 25 at 12:49AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Aransas, Calhoun, northeastern San Patricio, southern Victoria, southeastern Goliad, Refugio and southeastern Bee Counties through 130 AM CDT... At 1248 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles northwest of Point Comfort to near Beeville to near Argenta. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Beeville, Port Lavaca, Sinton, Refugio, Woodsboro, Seadrift, McFaddin, Skidmore, St. Paul, Point Comfort, Quintana, Long Mott, Tynan, Green Lake, Bonnie View, Tivoli, Blanconia, Alamo Beach, Dacosta and Bloomington. This includes the following highways... US Highway 181 between mile markers 592 and 628. US Highway 183 between mile markers 652 and 668. US Highway 59 between mile markers 694 and 698. US Highway 77 between mile markers 592 and 650. US Highway 87 between mile markers 822 and 840. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
